title: hanuma namma tAyi
sahitya:
hanuma namma tAyi tande bhIma namma bandhu baLaga Ananda tIrttarE namma gati gOdravayya


caraNam 1    tAyi tande hasuLegAgi sahAya mADi sAkuvante AyAsavillade sanjIvanava tande 
gAyagoNDa kapigaLannu sAyatande poreda raghurAyananghrigaLa sAkSi trEtA yugadi
    caraNam 2    bandhu baLaga tande ApadbAndhavanAgi pArthanige banda duritagaLa pariharisi 
andhaka jAtara kondu nanda kandArpaNenda gOvindananghrigaLe sAkSi dvApara yugadi
    caraNam 3    gati gOtrarande sAdhu matigaLige gatiya tOri mati keTTa ippattondu matava khaNdisi 
sundara mUruti vaiSNavarige gatiya tOride paramAtma gati purandara viTTalane sAkSi kaliyugadalli
